Events that occurred on 29 January

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1909 - Author and collector Richard E. Blackwelder is born.
1917 - Tolkien faces a Medical Board in Birmingham, but he is deemed not fit to return to war.
1943 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to J.L.N. O'Loughlin.
1953 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 135c.
1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to the Rector of the University of Liège.
1958 - Actor Alister Duncan is born.
1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 283b.
1968 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Ken Jackson.
1981 - J.A.W. Bennett, Inkling, dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring rests in Lothlórien.
